The Quranic researcher does not fear the other, so they are exposed to remembering, not to abstain from giving the newspapers and collecting their preachers, as they claimed and read the father.The rhetoric is not the same as their symptoms, that is, the Qur’an or the preceding remembrance in its saying is exalted, so what they have about the remembrance is exposed to the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is the one who is mentioned Because in the sense of the Qur’an or remembrance (P-135), it is a reminder and any remembrance, so whoever wants to remember him, his remembrance, and he won the causes of the two house The two people and the (spread and the hereafter) if they were made as in the footnotes in the sense of only.
